pages.text: O-Wolves work very similarly to vanilla wolves. However, they do have a few new features and traits to be aware of. $(br2)-O-Wolves hunt o-livestock. Sheep, cows, chickens, pigs, rabbits, goats and horses.

-Tamed O-Wolves donâ€™t hunt livestock unless told. $(br2)-Wild O-Wolves will be attacked & killed by guardian dog breeds by nature. $(br2)-Tamed O-Wolves will slowly regain health if hurt, and will panic and run away from a fight if under 33% health.
